attributes.action: Dedicate the October bank holiday to the NHS and NHS staff
attributes.additional_details: To say thank you and to show appreciation for the NHS and NHS staff, this year in particular due to the additional pressures on the service and the staff due to COVID but also as an ongoing annual day of recognition and appreciation for the vital work that the NHS and it’s staff do to look after us all
attributes.background: If the proposed October bank holiday is approved, then it should be dedicated to the NHS and NHS staff, to show our collective support and appreciation for the work that they do
